participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.background: i enjoy listening to classical music. i'm a christian. my favorite color is red. i can drive a tractor. my sister is a pole dancer.

content.text: i work so many hours like <num> a week so it is hard to find free time
